# TMNT Arcade Template

> **来源**: https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/tmnt-arcade-template-in-unreal-editor-for-fortnite
> **爬取时间**: 2025-12-26T23:54:11.328497

---

The **TMNT Arcade** template features an exciting new arcade game mode built in Unreal Editor for Fortnite (UEFN). Drawing from the rich legacy of TMNT and the powerful capabilities of UEFN, this mode is designed to captivate players with engaging gameplay, innovative mechanics, and nostalgic charm.

In the following sections, you will dive into each element of the template, exploring how all aspects of gameplay have been crafted to deliver a unique player experience. Whether you're a developer looking to understand the mechanics or a designer eager to push the concept further, this tutorial can inspire you to elevate this mode to new heights.

To access this template:

1. Open UEFN.
2. Go to **Brand Templates** > **Arcade**.
3. Create a new project.

[![TMNT Arcade Template](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/4c34dbe4-0b2e-4713-a80a-c5cbbcc6d29c?resizing_type=fit)](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/4c34dbe4-0b2e-4713-a80a-c5cbbcc6d29c?resizing_type=fit)

Check out the [City Starter template page](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/tmnt-city-starter-visual-styles-in-unreal-editor-for-fortnite) to learn about how to create different aesthetics in your games using post-processing!
